Once your account is deleted, all of its: Ina kua mukua to putea, ko ona rauemi katoa me nga raraunga ka mukua ano hoki. Tena koa whakamana ka hiahia koe ki te muku i to putea.
Kia mukua to putea, ka mukua katoa ona rawa me ana raraunga. Whakauruhia koa to kupuhipa hei whakaū kei te pirangi koe ki te muku i to putea.
or, enter the code manually: Ranei, uru ki te waehere ā-ringa

Recovery codes let you regain access if: Ko nga waehere whakaora kia tuku ano koe ki te whakauru ki te ngaro o to taputapu 2FA. Rokiroki ki roto i te Kaiwhakahaere Kupuhipa Haumaru.

When you enable two-factor authenticatio: A, no te whakahohe koe i te whakamanatanga rua-matua, ka akiakihia koe mo te titi haumaru i te takiuru. Ka taea te whakahoki mai i tenei PIN mai i te tono tautoko-tautoko i runga i to waea.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: Ki te whakamohiotanga e rua-waahanga i whakahoihia, ka akiakihia koe mo te tima haumaru, tupurangi tupurangi i te takiuru, ka taea e koe te whakahoki mai i te tono tautoko-tautoko i runga i to waea.
